SELECT trade.tno, trade.ttitle, trade.tdate, trade.tread, trade.tauctionstate, trade.tauctionminbidunit, trade.tauctionstartprice, trade.tauctioncurrentbidprice, member.mnickname, itemcategory.ino, itemcategory.iname FROM trade INNER JOIN member ON member.muuid = trade.muuid INNER JOIN itemcategory ON itemcategory.ino = trade.ino WHERE trade.ttype = 1
